entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who had his mother die and was stuck alone in the house. He is also described as shouting at Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is defending Dumbledore's writings and trying to explain Harry's behavior.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the author of some writings that Hermione is defending. It is also revealed that he had changed his views over time.

entities.name: blackbirds
entities.description: Blackbirds are mentioned as rising into the air and squawking when Harry shouts.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are arguing about Dumbledore's writings.
Dumbledore's writings have an influence on Harry, as he is defending them.
